divs: sighting detailstwo ( 2 ) diamond shaped objects viewed 8\15\2011 16:00'ish edst first, sighted aprox. 10 miles n\ne of gwinnett county airport. gcap reporting ceiling as broken at 6000ft. clouds appeared to move around stationary object. second, sighted aprox. 5 miles s\sw of gwinnett county airport. gcap reporting ceiling as broken at 6000ft. clouds appeared to move around stationary object. both object similar in appearence. metalic with darker framework. both highly reflected of sky\passing couds. both caused brief shadow in passing clouds...or reflected it's shadow of passing cloud. both visible over ga 316 and riverside, hwy 20, and hwy 120.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Decatur
There were no other sightings in Decatur on or around August 15th 2011
Summary: 2 diamond shaped obj S to N of GCAP, GA
